titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 25th anniversary of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/14/2011--Introduced. Recognizes the 25th anniversary of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the courage of the Ukrainian people in addressing its consequences. Commends efforts to mitigate the disaster's consequences, including U.S. and international assistance to the Chernobyl Shelter Fund and the Interim Spent Fuel Storage Facility.
